name: Baba Is You Mod: World Is Hell
name_original: Baba Is You Mod: World Is Hell
description:
this is a mod with a plot, which features many game jam version exploits / bugs Hempuli left in the original game: https://hempuli.itch.io/baba-is-you

All rights go to the original dev-team, not me.

I might potentially bring out updates or even a sequel if i see people enjoying this so you may as well give it a try!.
